data.eml:eml: The study area is Bunso, North of Accra and 120km, in the East Akim Municipality of the Eastern Region of Ghana and very close to the Linda Dor Restaurant on Accra - Kumasi road and also falls within the moist semi-deciduous forest type in Ghana. The area is characterized by high diversity of pioneer tree species and lies within decimal latitude and longitude 6.289405 and 0.467556 respectively. The study area is Bunso, North of Accra and 120km, in the East Akim Municipality of the Eastern Region of Ghana and very close to the Linda Dor Restaurant on Accra - Kumasi road and also falls within the moist semi-deciduous forest type in Ghana.
